divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking my dogs at 2 am April 4th. The sky had big cloud patches. Behind one of those patches I saw a very bright light approaching in a horizontal manner. Where i live it is usual to see police helicopters. What draw my attention was the speed it had and that it didn't make any sound. Absentmindedly I thought the sound might come later (as if it was a supersonic jet!) and I kept looking and waiting for it. But the bright object approached a clearing and then took off as a rocket, leaving a tail of flares after it, also without a sound. It looked like a shooting star, but in contrary direction. I kept looking for the object, but it was gone. I was not scared in any moment, since first I thought it was a helicopter. It was first after the event was over that I came to realize that I had seen a flying object that moved in a way that I have neither seen or heard of before.
Summary: Horizontal bright object took off as a rocket.
